dict.acceptation: 神父，牧师；司铎，司祭；领导者；神甫；

sent.orig: A famous scribe and priest descendant from Hilkiah the high priest.
sent.trans: 一个出名的文士和大祭司希勒家的后裔。

sent.orig: "Quasimodo! " they shouted,"High Priest Quasimado! Make way for the High Priest of Fools! "
sent.trans: “卡西莫多！”他们高喊，“大主教卡西莫多！为愚人们的大主教让路。”

sent.orig: I don't think those boys are comfortable talking in front of a priest.
sent.trans: 我想那些小孩不习惯在牧师面前说话。

sent.orig: This elderly Italian guy goes to his parish priest to confess.
sent.trans: 一位年长的意大利男人来向他的神父告解。

sent.orig: After while, a Jewish priest along and saw the poor man beside the road.
sent.trans: 过了一会儿，一个犹太人的祭师走来，看到这个可怜的人躺在路边。
